title: Senior Cloud Infrastructure Engineer
description: Design and implement scalable cloud infrastructure solutions for enterprise clients.1
requirements:
5+ years cloud infrastructure experience
AWS/Azure/GCP expertise
Terraform/CloudFormation
Strong networking knowledge

title: Cyber Security Analyst
description: Monitor, detect, and respond to security threats while implementing security best practices.
requirements:
3+ years security experience
CISSP or CEH certified
SIEM tools experience
Incident response expertise

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines and automate infrastructure deployment processes.
requirements:
4+ years DevOps experience
Kubernetes & Docker
Jenkins/GitLab CI
Python/Bash scripting

title: IT Project Manager
description: Lead IT transformation projects for enterprise clients from initiation to completion.
requirements:
PMP or equivalent
5+ years project management
Agile/Scrum experience
Excellent communication skills
